con:testCase.name: DuplicateEntryFound
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for AC04-Closed account

con:config.con:query: select distinct(CUSTOMERID),ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' fetch first 2 rows only

con:config.con:query: select A.MESSAGEID,A.MARKETTYPE,A.CUSTOMERID,A.INITIATORID,A.INITIATORBANKID,A.MESSAGEIDENTIFICATION,A.CREATIONDATETIME,C.PAYMENTSTATUS,C.ENDTOENDID, A.AGREEMENTID, A.SOURCEAPPLICATION,C.TRANSACTIONSID,C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID,C.PAYMENTTYPE,C.MARKETPRODUCTNAME,C.ISPC, C.DEBETACCOUNTNO,C.RELEASEDATE,C.REQUESTEDEXECUTIONDATE from MESSAGE A,PAYMENTINFO B, TRANSACTIONS C where A.MESSAGEID = B.FK_MESSAGEID and B.PAYMENTINFOID = C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID and A.MESSAGEIDENTIFICATION LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%' order by TRANSACTIONSID desc
select * from STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF where FK_STATUSREASONID in ('${STATUS_REASON#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/STATUSREASONID[1]}')

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Not a unique payment. Duplicate keys found.

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <Results> <ResultSet fetchSize="10"> <Row rowNumber="1"> <STATUSREASONADDTINFID>127894</STATUSREASONADDTINFID> <FK_STATUSREASONID>234548</FK_STATUSREASONID> <ADDITIONALINFORMATION>Not a unique payment. Duplicate keys found.</ADDITIONALINFORMATION> </Row> </ResultSet> </Results>
